a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of teachers who are female in primary vs tertiary education,
In almost all countries the share of women in primary education is much higher than the share of women in tertiary education.
Percentage of teachers in primary education who are female (%)
Percentage of teachers in tertiary education who are female (%)
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics
